topic.title: Create Self Contained .app Bundle for OSX
topic.body: This is meant to be used by non-technical people eventually right? I'm not sure many non-technical people, even myself as a technical people, are that enthused about installing homebrew, python, dev deps, running arbitrary commands, and then getting the app.

1604065129_mirrored_balupton_github.body: I could probably set up a virtual machine and give you remote access into it - although it would probably be extremely slow
